record.title: PERSONAL EXPLANATION
record.narrative:
PERSONAL EXPLANATION -- (House of Representatives - October 29, 2007)

[Page: H12134]

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, on Monday, October 29, 2007, I was absent from the House due to travel complications. Had I been present I would have voted:
On rollcall No. 1010--"nay"--H.R. 3224, Dam Rehabilitation and Repair Act of 2007.

On rollcall No. 1011--"yea"--H. Res. 573, Recognizing and commending the efforts of the United States public and advocacy groups to raise awareness about and help end the worsening humanitarian crisis and genocide in Darfur, Sudan, and for other purposes.
On rollcall No. 1012--"yea"--H. Res. 747, Recognizing the religious and historical significance of the festival of Diwali.
